content: भानुः [भा-नु <ls>Uṇ. 3. 32</ls>] {@--1@} Light, lustre, brightness. {@--2@} A ray of light; मंडिताखिलदिक्प्रांताश्चंडांशोः पांतु भानवः <ls>Bv. 1. 129</ls>; <ls>Śi. 2. 53</ls> <ls>Ms. 8. 132.</ls> {@--3@} The sun; भानुः सकृद्युक्ततुरंग एव <ls>Ś. 5. 4</ls>; भीमभानौ निदाघे <ls>Bv. 1. 30.</ls> {@--4@} Beauty. {@--5@} A day. {@--6@} A king, prince, sovereign. {@--7@} An epithet of Śiva. {%--<ab>f.</ab>%} A handsome woman.
